column4: Today (2024-Sep-30) is Boēdromiṓn 27, τετράδι φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 87 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Oct-01) is Boēdromiṓn 28, τρίτῃ φθίνοντος Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 88 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Oct-02) is Boēdromiṓn 29, ἕνῃ καὶ νέᾳ Βοηδρομιῶνος, day 89 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Oct-03) is Puanopsiṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Πυανοψιῶνος, day 90 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
This Puanopsiṓn will have 30 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) as opposed to a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) of 29.

Festivals in Puanopsiṓn:

-1: Khalkeia (Xαλkεῖα)
6: Proerosia (Προηροσία)
6: Oskhoporia (Ὠσχοφόρια)
7: Pyanopsia (Πυανόψια)
8: Theseia (Θησεῖα)
9: Stenia (Στήνια)
11–13: Thesmophoria (Θεσμοφόρια)
Today (2024-Oct-04) is Puanopsiṓn 2, δευτέρᾳ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 91 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Oct-05) is Puanopsiṓn 3, τρίτῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 92 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Oct-06) is Puanopsiṓn 4, τετράδι ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 93 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Oct-07) is Puanopsiṓn 5, πέμπτῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 94 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Oct-08) is Puanopsiṓn 6, ἕκτῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 95 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.

🏺 The Proerosia (Προηροσία) was probably celebrated on this day
The Oskhoporia (Ὠσχοφόρια) was celebrated on this day


https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oschophoria
Today (2024-Oct-09) is Puanopsiṓn 7, ἑβδόμῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 96 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.

🏺 This was the day of the Pyanopsia (Πυανόψια) or “Festival of the Boiled Beans” when an offering of bean stew was made to Apollo. I know that sounds like a joke, but it’s real\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pyanopsia
Today (2024-Oct-10) is Puanopsiṓn 8, ὀγδόῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 97 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
🏺 The Theseia (Θησεῖα) was celebrated on this day with races and other competitions\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theseia
Today (2024-Oct-11) is Puanopsiṓn 9, ἐνάτῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 98 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
🏺 The Stenia (Στήνια), a festival devoted to Demeter and Persephone, occurred on this day. It was a carnivalesque festival celebrated by women at night.\n\n
Today (2024-Oct-12) is Puanopsiṓn 10, δεκάτῃ ἱσταμένου Πυανοψιῶνος, day 99 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
Today (2024-Oct-13) is Puanopsiṓn 11, ἑνδεκάτῃ Πυανοψιῶνος, day 100 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
🏺 The first day (of three) of the Thesmophoria (Θεσμοφόρια), an important fertility festival the rituals for which were performed entirely by women.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thesmophoria
Today (2024-Oct-14) is Puanopsiṓn 12, δωδεκάτῃ Πυανοψιῶνος, day 101 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
🏺 The second day (of three) of the Thesmophoria (Θεσμοφόρια), an important fertility festival the rituals for which were performed entirely by women.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thesmophoria
Today (2024-Oct-15) is Puanopsiṓn 13, τρίτῃ ἐπὶ δέκα Πυανοψιῶνος, day 102 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
🏺 The third and last day of the Thesmophoria (Θεσμοφόρια), an important fertility festival the rituals for which were performed entirely by women.\n\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thesmophoria

Today (2024-Nov-01) is Puanopsiṓn 30, ἕνῃ καὶ νέᾳ Πυανοψιῶνος, day 119 of 355 in the year 2024/2025.
🏺 The Khalkeia (Χαλκεῖα), a festival of crafts-people, was celebrated today in honor of Athena and Hephaistos\n\n
